mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_number, name, goods_sort_id, collected, goods_stock, is_sale, is_hot, is_new, goods_desc, sale_total, price, sale_date, visit_num, create_date

from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_id, goods_number, name, goods_sort_id, collected, goods_stock, is_sale, is_hot, is_new, goods_desc, sale_total, price, sale_date, visit_num, create_date ) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsSortId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collected,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsStock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isSale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isHot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isNew,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsDesc,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{saleTotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{visitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
